まだ知らないコト照らして\r\n: Illuminating things I don't know yet
ねえ、教えて あの花は\r\n: Hey, tell me, why does that flower
きっと空とお話をするためでしょう！\r\n: It must be to talk to the sky!
風と舞う虫達は\r\n: The bugs dancing with the wind
なぜ光に集まるの？\r\n: Why do they gather around the light?
それは明るいステージで「ワン・ツー！」\r\n: Because on a bright stage, they want to dance 「One, two!」
不思議と出会うたび心ときめく\r\n: Every time I encounter something mysterious, my heart flutters
悲しみも喜びも巻き込んで\r\n: Wrapping up both sadness and joy
おひさまみたいなパワー届けたいの\r\n: I want to deliver power like the sun
笑顔 決して諦めません！\r\n: I won't give up on smiles!
いつか小さなつぼみ 開く時はあなたと一緒に\r\n: When my little bud blooms someday, I want to be with you
